name: My Cute Fuhrer
storyline: My Cute Fuhrer is an immersion in an anti–war game drawn in a cute anime style. Players will have to communicate with an anime girl who occupies the position of the Fuhrer. The character wants to achieve mastery in painting pictures and find his soulmate, simultaneously seizing power and implementing some large-scale world plans. The gameplay process is made in the form of a visual novel, where you have to actively communicate and interact with the girls inhabiting this alternative fictional world.
summary: A small satiric anti-war game with a cute Fuhrer as a lead character. Will you be able to melt her heart?
